content: the inez floral granny square is thirteenth block in the tenth annual moogly crochet along 1 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 2 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch crocheting in the round increasing crocheting in the front loop only and back loop only includes links to video tutorial crocheting in chain spaces includes video tutorial special stitch pattern bob fpsc includes written instructions and video tutorial in pattern **skill level** easy **finished size** 12 30 5 cm square **materials** caron one pound yarn 100% acrylic 16 oz/454 g/812 yd/742 m 1 skein each in 02005 sun yellow ca 10517 rose cb and 10620 grass green *or approximately 36 yd 33 m in ca 66 yd 60 5 m in cb and 84 yd 77 m in cc in any medium weight yarn* us size j-10/6 mm crochet hook *or size needed to obtain gauge* yarn needle **gauge** through round 10 in pattern = 6 5 16 5 cm *exact gauge is not critical for this project * 1 https //www mooglyblog com/category/2014-afghan-cal/mooglycal2024/ 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2024/06/27/crochet-pattern-inez-floral-granny-square/
